summary: This is an email chain from October 2020 regarding scheduling and logistical arrangements for Ghislaine Maxwell and her defense team to review discovery materials at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC). It involves FBI agents coordinating to assist with the presentation of digital evidence.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the defendant in the investigation, scheduled to review discovery items with her attorneys at MDC.

events.title: Maxwell Discovery Review
events.description: Scheduled for Ghislaine Maxwell and her attorneys to review discovery items, specifically digital evidence, at MDC with FBI assistance.

keyFacts: The email coordinates FBI agent assistance for Ghislaine Maxwell's discovery review at MDC.
The review involves digital evidence requiring a laptop and hard drive to be shown to Maxwell and her defense team.
The event was rescheduled multiple times due to defense counsel availability.
The document reflects ongoing legal proceedings in the Maxwell investigation in October 2020.
